actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide pension benefits for widows and children of certain persons whose in-service death occurred not in the line of duty.

summary.text: Provides pension benefits for widows and children of veterans who have completed at least 2 years of honorable service and whose in-service death does not occur in the line of duty. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 541 (f))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide pension benefits for widows and children of certain persons whose in-service death occurred not in the line of duty.
